QuestData.Title: The Final Piece
QuestData.Description: I am too injured to fight, $c. I have failed my city and its people. This battle is yours.$B$BVorpil waits just ahead. He's trying to use Auch'naaru's powers for some sort of dark ritual.$B$BYou must do what I could not. Cut Vorpil down and retrieve Auch'naaru so the Heart of Auchindoun can be whole once more!
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Auch'naaru from Vorpil Ribcleaver in Telmor.
QuestData.CompletionText: We need the final piece of the Heart!
QuestData.RewardText: Well done! I will take Auch'naaru to Auchindoun. The Shadow Council has no place in our lands.
